Package de.stocker.view

Class ChartFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • de.stocker.common.BaseInternalFrame
              • de.stocker.view.ChartFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStockListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class ChartFrame
extends BaseInternalFrame
implements IStockListener
    The Class ChartFrame provides the frame for all chart related drawings, while the drawing itself takes place in the ChartPanel class. The ChartFrame creates the menus and wrappers and fetches the data from the model.
    Author:
    Matthias Rudolph
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ChartFrame

        public ChartFrame​(IStockerModel stockerModel,
                  java.lang.String stockId,
                  EChartResolution chartResolution,
                  EChartType chartType,
                  java.awt.Color alarmColor,
                  java.awt.Color movingAvgColor,
                  java.awt.Color bollingerColor)
        Instantiates a new chart frame.
        Parameters:
        stockerModel - the stocker model
        stockId - the stock id
        chartResolution - the chart resolution
        chartType - the chart type
        alarmColor - the alarm color
        movingAvgColor - the Simple Moving Average color
        bollingerColor - the Bollinger Band color

      • showIndicatorOverviewDialog

        private void showIndicatorOverviewDialog()
        Shows the overview dialog of chart indicators. The dialog displays the currently active indicators and allows the user to select an indicator type to add to the chart.
